102656.text:
Fixed very rare volume corruption when a pod is deleted while kubelet is offline.
Retry FibreChannel devices cleanup after error to ensure FC device is detached before it can be used on another node.
102656.markdown:
Fixed very rare volume corruption when a pod is deleted while kubelet is offline.
  Retry FibreChannel devices cleanup after error to ensure FC device is detached before it can be used on another node. ([#102656](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/102656), [@jsafrane](https://github.com/jsafrane)) [SIG API Machinery, CLI, Cloud Provider, Cluster Lifecycle, Instrumentation and Storage]
102656.author: jsafrane

105673.text: support more than 100 disk mounts on Windows
105673.markdown: Support more than 100 disk mounts on Windows ([#105673](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/105673), [@andyzhangx](https://github.com/andyzhangx)) [SIG Storage and Windows]
105673.author: andyzhangx

105787.text: Fixes hostpath storage e2e tests within SELinux enabled env
105787.markdown: Fixes hostpath storage e2e tests within SELinux enabled env ([#105787](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/105787), [@Elbehery](https://github.com/Elbehery)) [SIG Testing]
105787.author: Elbehery

106113.text: Fix concurrent map access causing panics when logging timed-out API calls.
106113.markdown: Fix concurrent map access causing panics when logging timed-out API calls. ([#106113](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/106113), [@marseel](https://github.com/marseel)) [SIG API Machinery]
106113.author: marseel

106135.text: EndpointSlice Mirroring controller now cleans up managed EndpointSlices when a Service selector is added
106135.markdown: EndpointSlice Mirroring controller now cleans up managed EndpointSlices when a Service selector is added ([#106135](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/106135), [@robscott](https://github.com/robscott)) [SIG Apps, Network and Testing]
106135.author: robscott

106147.text:
Update debian-base, debian-iptables, setcap images to pick up CVE fixes
- Debian-base to v1.9.0
- Debian-iptables to v1.6.7
- setcap to v2.0.4
106147.markdown:
Update debian-base, debian-iptables, setcap images to pick up CVE fixes
  - Debian-base to v1.9.0
  - Debian-iptables to v1.6.7
  - setcap to v2.0.4 ([#106147](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/106147), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato)) [SIG Release and Testing]
106147.author: cpanato

106224.text: Kubernetes is now built with Golang 1.16.10
106224.markdown: Kubernetes is now built with Golang 1.16.10 ([#106224](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/106224), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato)) [SIG Cloud Provider, Instrumentation, Release and Testing]
106224.author: cpanato

106354.text: Fix a panic in kubectl when creating secrets with an improper output type
106354.markdown: Fix a panic in kubectl when creating secrets with an improper output type ([#106354](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/106354), [@lauchokyip](https://github.com/lauchokyip)) [SIG CLI]
106354.author: lauchokyip

106391.text: Fix a bug that `--disabled-metrics` doesn't function well.
106391.markdown: Fix a bug that `--disabled-metrics` doesn't function well. ([#106391](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/106391), [@Huang-Wei](https://github.com/Huang-Wei)) [SIG API Machinery, Cluster Lifecycle and Instrumentation]
